title: Date Difference in Minutes
description: In this lab, we will explore how to calculate the difference between two dates in minutes using JavaScript. We will use the Date object and a simple mathematical formula to obtain the time difference. By the end of this lab, you will be able to implement this functionality into your own projects and applications.

meta.title: Calculate Date Difference in Minutes
meta.description: Learn how to calculate the difference between two dates in minutes using JavaScript.
meta.keywords: javascript, javascript practice, minutes, date difference, javascript practice online, programming tutorial, javascript lab, javascript tutor, time difference

verify.name: Verify Node Commands Usage
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.

i18n.title: 计算日期差值（以分钟为单位）
i18n.description: 在本实验中，我们将探索如何使用JavaScript计算两个日期之间以分钟为单位的差值。我们将使用Date对象和一个简单的数学公式来获取时间差。完成本实验后，你将能够在自己的项目和应用程序中实现此功能。
